doc.field: OSG:OSG User Certificate Request for Richard T. Jones
Check for a response back from Richard

Richard,
Do you know anyone who would own a current DOEGrid cert that will be able to act as a sponsor for your request?
Thanks, -Alain

Dear Kyle Gross, Elizabeth Prout, Christopher Pipes, Alain Deximo (OSG VO RA/Sponsors),
An OIM Authenticated user; Richard T. Jones <richard.t.jones@uconn.edu> has requested a user certificate. Please determine this request's authenticity, and approve / disapprove at https://oim.grid.iu.edu/oim/certificateuser?id=67
NOTE: Additional user certificate request NOTE: Requested DN: /DC=com/DC=DigiCert-Grid/O=Open Science Grid/OU=People/CN=Richard T. Jones 594
